Recent evidence suggest canonical Wnt signal play profound role regulation lipid metabolism glucose homeostasis . Peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor delta ( PPAR-δ ) one Wnt target gene believe operative cardiometabolic protection . Interestingly , demonstrate impaired Wnt signal pathway contribute inflammation , foam cell formation , endothelial dysfunction recognize atherosclerosis pathogenic factor .
